sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
C.VehicleID $VehicleIDOrder$
C.registrationNo $registrationNoOrder$
C.workUnitName $workUnitNameOrder$
C.vehiclecount $vehiclecountOrder$
C.onLineRate $onLineRateOrder$
) RowNo, C.VehicleID as VehicleID ,C.registrationNo as registrationNo ,C.workUnitID as workUnitID , C.workUnitName as workUnitName ,C.vehiclecount as vehiclecount ,C.onLineRate as onLineRate , (100-C.onLineRate) AS offLineRate from ( select B.VehicleID ,B.registrationNo ,B.workUnitID ,B.workUnitName , convert(decimal(10,2),(cast(B.RealOnlineTime as DECIMAL(18,2)))/10) as vehiclecount , convert(decimal(10,2),100*(cast(B.RealOnlineTime as DECIMAL(18,2)))/(1440*#timeDay#)) as onLineRate from (select bvi.ID as VehicleID ,bvi.registrationNo as registrationNo ,bvi.workUnitId as workUnitID , bu.name as workUnitName ,isnull(A.RealOnlineTime,0) as RealOnlineTime from Pub_Vehicle bvi left outer join (select sum(bv.RealOnlineTime) as RealOnlineTime ,bv.VehicleID from bi_hta_vehicle_online_rate bv where bv.CreateTime >= cast('2013-07-22 00:00:00' AS dateTime) AND cast('2013-07-22 23:59:59' AS dateTime) >= bv. CreateTime GROUP BY VehicleID) A on A.VehicleID=bvi.id left outer join pub_workUnit bu on bu.id=bvi.workUnitId
bvi.isDeleted <> 1
) B) C
inner join (select pv.ID from (select id from pub_workUnit bi where bi.FullID like '%$fullId$%') pw inner join Pub_Vehicle pv on pv.workUnitId=pw.id) XX on xx.id=C.VehicleID
inner join (select pv.ID from (select vehicleID from Ent_userVehicle ev where ev.userid like '%$userId$%') ev inner join Pub_Vehicle pv on pv.id=ev.vehicleID ) XX on xx.id=C.VehicleID
and C.workUnitName='$workUnitNameWhere$'
and C.registrationNo like '%$registrationNo$%'
)A
A.RowNo BETWEEN $fromRow$ AND $toRow$

select count(*) from ( select bvi.ID as VehicleID ,bvi.registrationNo as registrationNo ,bvi.workUnitId as workUnitID ,bu.name as workUnitName ,isnull(A.RealOnlineTime,0) as RealOnlineTime from Pub_Vehicle bvi left outer join (select sum(bv.RealOnlineTime) as RealOnlineTime ,bv.VehicleID from bi_hta_vehicle_online_rate bv where bv.CreateTime >= cast(#startDate# AS dateTime) AND cast(#endDate# AS dateTime) >= bv.CreateTime GROUP BY VehicleID) A on A.VehicleID=bvi.id left outer join pub_workUnit bu on bu.id=bvi.workUnitId
bvi.isDeleted <> 1
) C
inner join (select pv.ID from (select id from pub_workUnit bi where bi.FullID like '%$fullId$%') pw inner join Pub_Vehicle pv on pv.workUnitId=pw.id) XX on xx.id=C.VehicleID
inner join (select pv.ID from (select vehicleID from Ent_userVehicle ev where ev.userid like '%$userId$%') ev inner join Pub_Vehicle pv on pv.id=ev.vehicleID ) XX on xx.id=C.VehicleID
and C.workUnitName='$workUnitNameWhere$'
and C.registrationNo like '%$registrationNo$%'
